author: cnbc.com
title: Pam Misialek Joins the Njevity Team as Director of Cloud Applications
text:
DENVER, March 19, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Njevity, Inc. announced today that Pam Misialek has joined the Colorado-based company as Director of Cloud Applications. Pam will be responsible for leading the PowerGP Online product line, developing new business opportunities and creating innovative solutions that improve the life and business success of Njevity's Partners and Customers.
Pam is a well-known figure in the ERP industry with over 20 years of experience at Microsoft where she most recently led the Dynamics GP product line and was a vital part of the Dynamics GP community. Pam has a proven record of facilitating long-term business relationships with both customers, partners and ISV's (Independent Software Vendors).
"I am thrilled to join the Njevity Team," says Pam. "I have a deep respect for the Dynamics GP Community and the innovative work that Njevity has been doing to provide mid-market customers with an easy cloud ERP solution that combines the broad, deep functionality of Dynamics GP that customers love with the trusted, secure Microsoft Azure Cloud. I am looking forward to working with our Partners and Customers to take PowerGP Online to the next level."
According to Chris Dobkins , President and CEO of Njevity, "We are very excited to welcome Pam to the Njevity team. Her passion for our Community of Dynamics GP Partners and Customers coupled with her years of experience bringing innovative ERP solutions to the SMB market make her the perfect person to take the reins of Njevity's Cloud Application team. Together, we will help our Partners and Customers reach higher, see further, and achieve more than they ever thought possible."
If you would like more information about this topic, please contact Mike McPhilomy at 720-870-9700 x107 or email at sales@njevity.com .
About Njevity
Njevity, Inc. , based in Denver, Colorado, has been providing Cloud and On-Premises Accounting and Customer Relationship Management solutions to mid-market customers all over the world since 2001. Their NjevityToGo Private Cloud enables Microsoft Dynamics Partners to offer reliable, compliant, and highly performing Dynamics Cloud solutions under the Partners' brands. Their PowerGP Online Public Cloud offering is built on Microsoft Dynamics GP, powered by the Microsoft Azure Cloud, and provides partners with the only true Software as a Service (SaaS) offering for Dynamics GP that integrates with Microsoft's Office 365 and Power BI cloud apps.
Njevity's success is driven by their steadfast focus on improving the life and success of their Partners and Customers by providing exceptional business application experiences that simplify, inform and delight. The Njevity team consists of 26 team members, including two Microsoft MVP's, who help nearly 3,000 users have exceptional cloud experiences every day. Njevity is a Gold Certified Microsoft Partner and a Tier-1 Cloud Service Provider that has earned competencies in Dynamics ERP, Dynamics CRM, and Cloud Technologies.
